DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text term to signify whether or not nonmeasurable disease is present using the Recist criteria. [Manually-curated]

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to non-measurable disease being present.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Non-Measurable; not possible to be measured.:A definite pathologic process with a characteristic set of signs and symptoms. It may affect the whole body or any of its parts, and its etiology, pathology, and prognosis may be known or unknown.

Concepts.definition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.

Property.preferredDefinition: Present; the period of time that is happening now.

Concepts.definition: Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 10-22-18 Registration status changed to Qualified/TMT.. 10-19-2018 TMT received permission from BC to transfer ownership from CTEP to NCI Standards.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function._Measurement is the act or process of determining the size or magnitude of something; the size or magnitude of something._An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

Concepts.definition: Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not existing in a specified place at a specified time.

Concepts.definition: Not existing in a specified place at a specified time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: indication of the presence and extent of disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.:Measurement is the determination of the size or magnitude of something.  It is also used ro refer to the result of this act.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.
Measurement is the determination of the size or magnitude of something.  It is also used ro refer to the result of this act.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

DataElement.changeDescription: Curated to support Duke University adoption of C3D
